product_name: Pearl Izumi ELITE In-R-Cool Tri Singlet - Women's
long_description: Come race day, don't leave anything to chance. Be prepared with the highly technical Pearl Izumi ELITE In-R-Cool Tri singlet. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric reflects the sun's rays to reduce the fabric temperature by up to 35 degrees; when the fabric is cooler you are, too. Textured fabric over shoulders enhances aerodynamics. Fully constructed shelf bra provides support and breathability; bra is comprised of 78% nylon/22% elastane. 2 easy-access back pockets keep nutrition just a reach away. Flatlock seams reduce abrasion, bolster muscle support and ensure a streamlined look and feel. The Pearl Izumi ELITE In-R-Cool singlet is formfitting and has a UPF 50+ sun protection rating.
short_description: Come race day, don't leave anything to chance. Be prepared with the highly technical Pearl Izumi ELITE In-R-Cool Tri singlet.
